data.text: Eka Ayub nodwoke kama:
“Ka dine bed ni inyalo pimo chandruok ma an-go,
to adier, dine gibedo mapek moloyo kwoyo mathoth manie dho nam,
Aserni mag Jehova Nyasaye Maratego osechwoyo denda,
Donge punda nyalo mana ywak ka oonge lum mocham,
Chiemo maboth bende inyalo cham ka ok oketie chumbi,
Ok ahero chiemo ma kamago;
“Kuom mano, mad ayud gima akwayo,
kendo oyie otoya matindo tindo
Kotimona kamano eka chunya noyud hoch,
“Teko mane ma an-go ma dimi pod abed gi geno?
An gi teko machal gi teko kidi koso?
Bende an gi teko mar konyora kenda
“E kinde ma ngʼato nigi chandruok kama,
Owetena to oselokore joma ok nyal gen,
to pe manie wi gode lokore oula
e kinde oro to gichungʼ ma ok ringi,
Jowuoth baro weyo yoregi ma giluwo;
Jowuoth moa Tema
Gibiro ka gin gi geno mar yudo pi,
Koro in bende iselokori ngʼama ok nyal konyo;
Bende asekwayoue mondo umiyae kony moro mugolo
kata mondo uresa e lwet wasika,
“Puonja, eka analingʼ,
Mano kaka weche madier lit kaka kudho!
Dibed ni iwuoyo kamano mondo omi iket weche ma awacho kare
Ichalo ngʼama nyalo goyo ombulu mar nego nyathi kich
“To koro yie ichomie wangʼi kuoma kendo iranga maber
Lokri, iwe timo ne ji marach;
Bende nitie gimoro amora marach ma lewa osewacho?
